text.tspan: wall, is exposed to a crushing
Belay here, not higher up. Route the rope
here so the follower is protected. The
follower couldn't see you climbing and
doesn't know where the route goes.
Don't try to place pro over here. Placing
it is a riskier move than just exiting the
alcove, and it exposes the follower to a
How not to have an epic on Traitor Horn, and how
not to set your follower up for one either.
